post.body: i'm glad ur not dead. 2 good movies.
i was going through facebook and found pictures of u with short hair. i can't decide how i like it better. church
send a little bit my way please.
burn after reading. i wish i had brought home my own shampoo and conditioner, my hair is gross.
what? thunder snow? that sounds awesome. hows the north treating you?
oh and the redskins beat the eagles. always a good thing
lols, putting up the tree i hope the needles don't fall off
heading out to wal mart to buy more christmas lights
how does the house always need cleaning
longest day of shopping ever. quick dinner to reengergize. can i still call it dinner at 9:30?
shopping part duex with mary bo
agreed to let mary's friend come over to make cookies. they are not making chocolate chip i want to cry.
i'm not crazy my sister took advantage of my trust in her. lols, or am i crazy?
nobody believe what tori says, shes going crazy and now my body hurts from her being a rock. I LOVE YOU TORIA!
mary didn't choose me as her confirmation sponsor. to make up for it she promised i can be her maid of honor and the 1st godmother
rainy day, oven fixed with no catastrophe, two pairs of possible pants. patel stop packing then.
going shopping with my friends.
*bye
by Dravo awesomeness, Walkersville - step up your game this break.
I just need to throw on some pants. Oh look, conveniently they are right there.
